request.description:
Add new adjacency
There must be existing local/remote mappings to specified eid's

equivalent of 

    lisp_add_del_adjacency is_add 1 vni 12 eid_type 0 deid 192.168.2.1 seid 192.168.2.3 deid_len 32 seid_len 32

right now no dump variant is existing in api

Creates bridgfe domain. Corresponds to invoking:

vat#  bridge_domain_add_del bd_id [bd_id] learn 0 forward 0 uu-flood 0 flood 1 arp-term 0

To verify run:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Creates bridgfe domain. Corresponds to invoking:

vat#  bridge_domain_add_del bd_id [bd_id] learn 0 forward 0 uu-flood 0 flood 1 arp-term 0

To verify run:

vppctl show bridge-domain [bd_id] detail

Enables Lisp feature

equivalent of 

    lisp_enable_disable is_en 1

can be verified with 

    show_lisp_status

Reads status of lisp feature

equivalent of 

    show_lisp_status

Adds new local mapping

equivalent of 

    lisp_add_del_local_eid is_add 1 eid_type 0 eid 192.168.2.1 prefix_len 32 vni 12 locator_set_name loc_1
    
can be verified with

    lisp_eid_table_dump eid_set 1 prefix_length 32 vni 12 eid_type 0 eid 192.168.2.1 filter 1

item.name: Add local mapping loc_map_10 - prefix based

request.description:
Adds new local mapping

equivalent of 

    lisp_add_del_local_eid is_add 1 eid_type 0 eid 192.168.3.8 prefix_len 24 vni 12 locator_set_name loc_1
    
can be verified with

    lisp_eid_table_dump eid_set 1 prefix_length 24 vni 12 eid_type 0 eid 192.168.3.8 filter 1

item.name: Negative Case -  Locator set loc_1 as empty

request.description:
Add new locator set

equivalent of 
    
    lisp_add_del_locator_set is_add 1 locator_set_name loc_1
    
can be verified with 

    lisp_locator_set_dump

Requests to add empty locator-sets will be rejected

item.name: Add Locator set loc_1 with locator for local0

request.description:
Add new locator set

equivalent of 
    
    lisp_add_del_locator_set is_add 1 locator_set_name loc_1
    
can be verified with 

    lisp_locator_set_dump

Requests to add empty locator-sets will be rejected

item.name: Add Locator set loc_1 with locator for local0 copy

request.description:
Add new locator set

equivalent of 
    
    lisp_add_del_locator_set is_add 1 locator_set_name loc_1
    
can be verified with 

    lisp_locator_set_dump

Requests to add empty locator-sets will be rejected

Add new locator set

equivalent of 
    
    lisp_add_del_locator_set is_add 1 locator_set_name loc_1
    
can be verified with 

    lisp_locator_set_dump

Requests to add empty locator-sets will be rejected

Reads data of locator set 

equivalent of 
    
    lisp_locator_set_dump

Add locator under locator-set

equivalent of 

    lisp_add_del_locator is_add 1 locator_set_name loc_1 sw_if_index INDEX priority 2 weight 3

can be verified with 

    lisp_locator_dump locator_set_index INDEX

Reads data of specified locator

equivalent of

    lisp_locator_dump locator_set_index INDEX

Reads data of map resolver

equivalent of 

    lisp_map_resolver_dump

Adds new map resolver

equivalent of

    lisp_add_del_map_resolver is_add 1 is_ipv6 0 ip_address 192.168.2.1

can be verified with
    
    lisp_map_resolver_dump

Reads data of map resolver

equivalent of 

    lisp_map_resolver_dump

Enable Pitr feature 

equivalent of 

    lisp_pitr_set_locator_set is_add 1 ls_name loc_1
    
can be verified with

    show_lisp_pitr

Reads Pitr feature status

equivalent of

    show_lisp_pitr

Adds new remote mapping with negative mapping

equivalent of 

    lisp_add_del_remote_mapping is_add 1 vni 12 action 0 eid_type 0 eid 192.168.2.1 eid_len 32

can be verified with

    lisp_eid_table_dump eid_set 1 prefix_len 32 vni 12 eid_type 0 eid 192.168.2.1 filter 2

item.name: Get remote  negative mapping Config -  Bridge Domain
Get remote  negative mapping Operational -  Bridge Domain

request.description:
Adds new remote mapping with positive mapping

equivalent of 

    lisp_add_del_remote_mapping is_add 1 vni 12 rloc_num NR_OF_LOCATORS rlocs BINARY_DATA eid_type 0 eid 192.168.2.3 eid_len 32
    
binary data of remote locators should be in format

    [1 byte(ipv4/ipv6), 1 byte(priority), 1 byte(weight), 16 byte(address),...]

can be verified with

    lisp_eid_table_dump eid_set 1 prefix_len 32 vni 12 eid_type 0 eid 192.168.2.3 filter 2
